data.eml:eml: A new species of Chama (Bivalvia, Chamidae) from Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valentich-Scott, Paul, Coan, Eugene V. (2010): A new species of Chama (Bivalvia, Chamidae) from Mexico. Zootaxa 2446: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293938
